fields.text: Welcome to App Annie in San Francisco, the standard in app analytics and market data.
Press [INDEX] for sales and account information.
Press [INDEX] for demo requests and pricing.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for demo requests and pricing.
Press [INDEX] for billing and subscription questions.
Please hold while we connect you to the billing team for subscription inquiries.
Press [INDEX] for technical support and troubleshooting.
Press [INDEX] for reporting service outages or errors.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical team regarding service outages.
Press [INDEX] for API integration and developer support.
Please hold while we connect you to our developers for API integration support.
